panels.description: The number of active listeners for the queue manager.
panels.title: Active listeners

panels.description: The number of active connections for the queue manager.
panels.title: Active connections

panels.description: The unique number of queues being managed by the queue manager.

panels.description: The estimated memory usage of the queue managers.
panels.title: Estimated memory utilization

panels.description: A table showing the status and uptime of the queue manager.
panels.title: Queue manager status

panels.description: The system/user CPU usage of the queue manager.
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: The disk allocated to the queue manager that is being used.
panels.title: Disk usage

panels.description: The commits of the queue manager.
panels.title: Commits

panels.description: The amount of data being pushed from the queue manager to subscribers.
panels.title: Publish throughput

panels.description: The number of messages being published by the queue manager.
panels.title: Published messages

panels.description: The expired messages of the queue manager.
panels.title: Expired messages

panels.description: The number of queue operations of the queue manager.

targets.expr: sum by (mq_cluster, qmgr, job) (ibmmq_queue_mqset_count{job=~"$job", mq_cluster=~"$mq_cluster", qmgr=~"$qmgr"})
sum by (mq_cluster, qmgr, job) (ibmmq_queue_mqinq_count{job=~"$job", mq_cluster=~"$mq_cluster", qmgr=~"$qmgr"})
sum by (mq_cluster, qmgr, job) (ibmmq_queue_mqget_count{job=~"$job", mq_cluster=~"$mq_cluster", qmgr=~"$qmgr"})
sum by (mq_cluster, qmgr, job) (ibmmq_queue_mqopen_count{job=~"$job", mq_cluster=~"$mq_cluster", qmgr=~"$qmgr"})
sum by (mq_cluster, qmgr, job) (ibmmq_queue_mqclose_count{job=~"$job", mq_cluster=~"$mq_cluster", qmgr=~"$qmgr"})
sum by (mq_cluster, qmgr, job) (ibmmq_queue_mqput_mqput1_count{job=~"$job", mq_cluster=~"$mq_cluster", qmgr=~"$qmgr"})

panels.title: Queue operations

panels.description: The recent latency of log writes.
panels.title: Log latency

panels.description: The amount of data on the filesystem occupied by queue manager logs.
panels.title: Log usage

panels.description: Recent error logs from the queue manager.
panels.title: Error logs
